Publications around Radia







The physical and computational principles of the code were described in:

  • P. Elleaume, O. Chubar, J. Chavanne, "Computing 3D Magnetic Field from Insertion Devices", Proc. of the PAC97 Conference, p.3509-3511.
  • O. Chubar, P. Elleaume, J. Chavanne, "A 3D Magnetostatics Computer Code for Insertion devices", J. Synchrotron Rad. (1998) 5, p.481-484.
  • O. Chubar, P. Elleaume, J. Chavanne, C. Benabderrahmane, O. Macouille, F. Marteau, "Application of Finite Volume Integral Approach to Computing of 3D Magnetic Fields Created by Distributed Iron-Dominated Electromagnet Structures", Proc. of the EPAC2004 Conference, p.1675-1677.

Last modified: September 2004.  Comments are welcome.
